clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Egito Association in the Treatment of Type II Diabetes Mellitus and Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: National, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Triple-dummy, Phase III Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Egito Association in the Treatment of Type II Diabetes Mellitus and Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Egito association in the treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypertension

primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline in glycated hemoglobin
Changes from baseline in SBP in ambulatory blood pressure monitoring

secondary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study

intervention.description: EGITO Egito coated tablet. EMPAGLIFLOZIN PLACEBO Empagliflozin placebo coated tablet. TELMISARTAN PLACEBO Telmisartan coated tablet.
Drug: EMPAGLIFLOZIN Empagliflozin 25 mg coated tablet. Drug: TELMISARTAN Telmisartan 40/80 mg coated tablet. EGITO PLACEBO Egito placebo coated tablet.
